item.title: Mythic Secret Santa
item.description: Christmas is upon us! I've decided to run a little secret santa for my WOW guild. The rules are pretty simple: Minimum spend of 20g My character “mythicsanta” will contact each of the participants with the name of whom they'll be Santa for Each participant will send “mythicsanta” the gift before the 22nd December On christmas, I'll proxy the gifts through to each of the recipients as “Santa”. I will not be participating because I don't want to be biased and I need to be the sole orchestrator to not ruin the magic.
